result.execSummary:
The defendant London Nicole Hiers was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. London Nicole Hiers is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • London Nicole Hiers was found guilty of Possession of Methamphetamine [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(g).
  • London Nicole Hiers was found guilty of Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: 2:26 PM Defendant London Nicole Hiers in court.  Attorney Brian T. Kane in court for London Nicole Hiers.  Attorney Amy Pautzke in court for State of Wisconsin.  Atty. Kane advises court on PSI w/no contact between Deft. and Agent.  Deft. would be willing to interview w/Agent.  Court advises we can proceed w/o complete PSI or revoke bond and have Deft. meet w/Agent and complete PSI.  Deft. chooses to proceed to sentencing.  Sentence recommendations by counsel.  Court sentence:  WI STATE PRISON - 3 1/2 years.  18 months IC and 2 years ES.  92 days credit.  Deft. is not eligible for CIP.  Deft. is eligible for SAP.  Conditions of ES:  No possession or consumption of alcohol or any controlled substance without a valid prescription.  Comply w/any assessments, counseling, treatment and any resulting recommendations made by the DOC.  Submit DNA Sample.  Supervision fees as ordered and payable to DOC during probation.  Court costs Ct. 1 - $538.  Count 3 - $463.00 court costs Submit DNA Sample.  $2000.00 bond to be applied to costs balance refunded to payor.

1:05 PM Prosecuting attorney Amy R. Greenwood Pautzke in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant London Nicole Hiers in court, in custody.  Attorney Brian T. Kane in court for London Nicole Hiers.  Plea neg. put on the record orally.  Deft. to enter plea to Ct. 1 and 3 as charged and a recommendation of 2 years Probation.  Court reads information and deft. enters a NO CONTEST Plea to Ct. 1 & Ct. 3.  Plea quest. & waiver of rights reviewed.  Voting/Firearms.  Court finds plea made freely & voluntarily.  Deft. is adjudged guilty of Ct. 1 and Ct. 3 and court orders a JOC entered into the record.  Balance of counts are dismissed.  PSI ordered.  Present bond cont'd.
Sentencing hearing scheduled for September 26, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
